name: The Bride of Karsaz
description:
Due to the file size restrictions on Itch, we had to place our game elsewhere to allow it to run on the web. Play the game here: https://bride.atreidestechnologies.com/

The game might take a bit to load the first time. After that, the loading times improve. We would suggest using Chrome or Firefox for playing.

Controls:

  • Press E to interact with doors and objects.
  • Press G to drop items that you are holding. Sometimes you may need to drop items to pick others.
  • Use the left mouse click to use the held item.
  • Use the right mouse click to zoom into things.

Objective:

  • Locate which room Vivek is held in.
  • Find the three broken key fragments and a duct tape to form a key.
  • Use the torches, candles and match sticks to help you see.
  • Survive

Extra details:

  • All items grant points. Finishing the game fast also nets you bonus points. The team with the most points makes it to the top of the board.
  • The entity is based on a real-life story.
  • The model for the bride was designed by one of our designers.
  • Keeps your eyes peeled and you might spot some easter eggs, some references and some posters of the developers.
